param.name: documents.permissions.introduction
param.value:
To adjust document store permissions choose Configure Permissions. Each document store has a set of permissions that indicate which user roles are allowed to perform a document store function. By default, the Document Store Owner role is capable of all document store functions, while a Guest has very limited functionality.

There are four major access levels:

param.name: setup.welcome.setupProcessGuide.text
param.value:
Registering this application with Dark Horse Ventures is required before installation, whether you already have a license or not. We have made the registration process very simple:
  • An internet connection is required before continuing
  • The freely available version of Centric CRM will entitle this system to a maximum of five (5) users
  • You must agree to the Centric CRM License Agreement
  • The Centric CRM administrator will receive information about software updates as they become available

param.name: documents.permissions.manager
param.value: Document Store Manager: Usually the creators(s) of the document stores and having the most control of the data

param.name: project.singleMultipleWildcard.example
param.value: To perform a single character wildcard search use the ${quot}?${quot} symbol:${break}${break}cam?aign${break}${break}To perform a multiple character wildcard search use the ${quot}*${quot} symbol:${break}${break}ca*gn${break}campaign*${break}${break}Note: You cannot use a * or ? symbol as the first character of a search.

param.name: setup.databaseServerInstallation.text
param.value:
• Before continuing, the database server must be installed and functional
  • The database administrator should create a user called "centric_crm"
  • The database administrator should create a new database, with UNICODE encoding, called "centric_crm"
  • The centric_crm user must have full permissions on the centric_crm database
  • Once configured, enter the database connection information below, then press continue to verify the settings
  • If you are using the source code version, then you must have used the "ant installdb" command

param.name: setup.reasonsToReceiveMessage.text
param.value:
• You are an administrator in the process of upgrading Centric CRM and you are ready to proceed with the upgrade.
  • You are a user expecting to be able to login, however, at this time it appears the software is being upgraded by an administrator. If this screen persists, you might review any emails that you may have received from your administrator or you might contact your administrator for more information.
  • If an upgrade was not planned, then there might be a configuration issue that needs to be resolved. If this is the case, then you might try proceeding with the upgrade process to verify your installation.
